segments.text: Hello , could I speak to Allison , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry , he's out at the moment .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: When do you expect him back ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think he'll be back in about an hour at least .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , may I leave a message ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you please ask him to call Chris when he gets back ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok . Does he know your number ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm afraid he doesn't . My mobile is 139- 2477 - 4026 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: 13924774026 . All right . Thanks for calling . Oh , hang on , someone's at the door that may be him , please hold on .
segments.speaker: S2
